Class Neo4jRelationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.buschmais.xo.neo4j.impl.datastore.AbstractNeo4jPropertyManager<org.neo4j.graphdb.Relationship>
      • com.buschmais.xo.neo4j.impl.datastore.Neo4jRelationManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatastorePropertyManager<org.neo4j.graphdb.Relationship,PropertyMetadata>, DatastoreRelationManager<org.neo4j.graphdb.Node,Long,org.neo4j.graphdb.Relationship,RelationshipMetadata,RelationshipType,PropertyMetadata>

    public class Neo4jRelationManager
extends AbstractNeo4jPropertyManager<org.neo4j.graphdb.Relationship>
implements DatastoreRelationManager<org.neo4j.graphdb.Node,Long,org.neo4j.graphdb.Relationship,RelationshipMetadata,RelationshipType,PropertyMetadata>
    Implementation of a DatastoreRelationManager for Neo4j.
